resources.string: First rest your left thumb on the vertical bar and then place your right thumb on the horizontal bar. Slowly slide your thumbs across the screen to generate sounds. Good luck, and don\'t forget to check out the menu for sound effects!

"The theremin is an early electronic musical instrument controlled without discernible physical contact from the player. It is named after its Russian inventor, Professor Léon Theremin, who patented the device in 1928." \n\n- from Wikipedia
The Pocket Theremin was created by Carl Thomé and Oskar Thorén as a homework assignment at KTH Royal Institute of Technology.
You may do whatever you wish with this app, including its binaries and source code. Even for commercial use and distribution.\n\nBeware that graphics may be copyrighted by their respective authors.
Turn up the volume on your device!
